Author: Autumnbadger
Text: I can relate to this so hard, when I get bad news/scared/upset even the thought of food makes me feel repulsed. What a shitty trade off, right? No appetite but something horrible has to happen for it and it only lasts for a bit. Monkey's paw - like. I hope your news turns out for the better and everything works out. Everyone on here is rooting for you
